customize.text: Unlock Requirements

Sneak up to two Fatui speaking to one another near a container at <color=#ece5d8>Kuuvahki Experimental Design Bureau</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Location -</color> <color=#ece5d8>Kuuvahki Experimental Design Bureau, Nod-Krai</color>
Teleport to the nearby waypoint and go to the quest location.

Watch a cutscene where two Fatui inspect the supplies.
Afterwards, use the monitor to call another container, then enter it to sneak inside the Bureau.
Quest Objective: Enter and explore the Kuuvahki Experimental Design Bureau

<color=#ffffff73>Upon entering this room, the quest will start.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>The inside of the Bureau has many puzzles and chests available for taking, but many are not necessary to complete this quest.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Getting to this spot,</color> the player <color=#ffffff73>will hear Fatui speaking about their leader obtaining a Proof of Cognoscenti.</color>

The player <color=#ffffff73>will come across Fatui stationed across the Bureau.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Sneaking through them is an option, but if</color> the player <color=#ffffff73>chooses to fight, reinforcements will arrive if</color> the player <color=#ffffff73>does not dispatch all enemies within 20 seconds.</color>

<color=#ffffff73>The next point of interest is this lift.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Choose to “Go Up” in order to progress the quest.</color>
<color=#ffffff>Quest Description:</color> <color=#ffffff>Breaking into the heavily guarded Fatui facility was unexpectedly easy...</color>
Quest Objective: Investigate the chests
Quest Objective: Talk to Paimon
Quest Objective: Hide in the container nearby

Go to the untouched Exquisite Chest for a cutscene.
Afterwards, interact with the container to progress.
Quest Objective: Defeat the Fatui
Quest Objective: Talk to the mysterious girl
Quest Objective: Defeat the Fatui

After the cutscene, the player will face the Fatui.
Right after their defeat, a cutscene, before a second wave appears to face the player.
Quest Objective: Look for a way to exit the room

Use the nearby console to control a Cleaning Bot on the other side.
Use the Kuuvahki to steal a keycard from one of the guards, then open the door with it.
Quest Objective: Look for the owner of the lost item
Quest Objective: Talk to the girl
Quest Objective: Find a way to rescue the girl
Quest Objective: Talk to the girl
<color=#ffffff73>A cutscene plays here where the mysterious girl talks to the guards about locations of interest and the leader of the Bureau.</color>

<color=#ffffff73>After talking with the girl, use the Cleaning Bot to get a nearby keycard, then go through the bot vent in this room.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>After bringing the keycard to the other side, exit controlling the bot and use</color> the player's <color=#ffffff73>own character to manipulate the keycard into coming in contact with the lock.</color>
<color=#ffffff>Quest Description:</color> <color=#ffffff>You meet a girl named Netochka, who infiltrated the Design Bureau in search of the legendary "Proof of the Cognoscenti" left behind by Reed Miller, but was captured by the Fatui. To repay you for saving her, she resolves to make us her companions in the quest for the "Proof"...</color>
Quest Objective: Defeat the Fatui
Quest Objective: Go to the dormitory
Quest Objective: Talk to Netochka

Having banded with Netochka, the player's next course of action is reaching the dormitory
Fight off the Fatui here, then proceed outside
Quest Objective: Continue onward with Netochka
Quest Objective: Defeat the Fatui
Quest Objective: Continue onward with Netochka
Quest Objective: Talk to Netochka

Follow Netochka and eliminate the Fatui groups the player comes across.
Quest Objective: Continue onward
Quest Objective: Continue onward with Netochka
Quest Objective: Look for clues inside the dormitory
Quest Objective: Discuss the matter with Paimon
Quest Objective: Talk to Netochka
Ride the Moonlane back inside.

After the cutscene, check all the clue spots here.
Upon finding the floor map, the player will discuss it with Paimon.
The player's conversation with Netochka will be interrupted by the Fatui, but no fights this time.
Quest Objective: Go to the archives
Quest Objective: Defeat the Fatui
Quest Objective: Enter the archives

Ride the lift.
Upon arriving, the player will have to face the Fatui, including Serzhant Melekhov.
Once they are dispatched, the player may proceed.
Quest Objective: Look for clues in the archives
Quest Objective: Talk to Netochka
Quest Objective: Go to the disposal workshop

Interact with the computer to proceed the quest.
After talking with Netochka, follow her to the gate here.
Quest Objective: Find a way to open the gate
Quest Objective: Defeat the Fatui
Quest Objective: Continue onward with Netochka

To unlock the gate, control the Cleaning Bot.
First, convince the Fatui the player is operating correctly by cleaning the dirt spots nearby.
Once they no longer find the player suspicious, the guards in the back will start turning around, allowing the player to grab the keycard from the one in the left.
Use it to open the door, then defeat the Fatui.
Afterwards, proceed ahead.
Quest Objective: Enter the disposal workshop
Quest Objective: Talk to Raskolnikov
Quest Objective: Defeat the opponents
Quest Objective: Talk to Netochka
Quest Objective: Use the destruction module to defeat opponents
Quest Objective: Defeat the opponents

<color=#ffffff73>Arriving in the disposal workshop,</color> a dialogue section will appear first <color=#ffffff73>and then the fight starts.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Let the destruction module do most of the work in destroying</color> the <color=#ffffff73>enemies, and don’t go near it.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>When the “Cutting Edge Fire Support Ground Effect Landcruiser” appears,</color> the player <color=#ffffff73>must attack it becomes invulnerable.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>After a cutscene,</color> the player <color=#ffffff73>may now use the Kuuvahki to control the destruction module and damage</color> the <color=#ffffff73>foe.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Do note the robot will become invulnerable again, meaning</color> the player <color=#ffffff73>must continue to smash it with the destruction module to advance.</color>
Quest Objective: Use the destruction module to reach the upper floor
Quest Objective: Go to the second floor of the disposal workshop
Quest Objective: Catch up to Netochka

Climb the destruction module, then proceed ahead to the stairs.
Use the Moonlane to reach Netochka.
Quest Objective: Defeat the Fatui
Quest Objective: Talk to Netochka
Quest Objective: Find a way to enter an empowered state
Quest Objective: Move the cleaning bot to a suitable location
Quest Objective: Catch up to Netochka

Arriving here, the player will find Netochka already fighting the Fatui.
Then, the player must talk to her about how to proceed.

Nearby the player will find a terminal and a Cleaning Bot surrounded by boxes.
Destroy the boxes, then lead the bot to the designated antenna
Netochka will go ahead and then the player only need to follow her by jumping up on the Unipolar Field.
(Netochka will stop if the player is not close enough, so wait for her to move first).
Quest Objective: Talk to Raskolnikov
Quest Objective: Defeat Raskolnikov

Atop the Bureau, the player will face off Raskolnikov after a dialogue sequence.
After having his health depleted, he will recover once and summon a shield that is only depleted by elemental attacks.
The shield must be fully damaged thrice before it deactivates.
Once that is done, the player simply needs to defeat him.
Quest Objective: Talk to Netochka
The player will receive “The Sins of the Fathers” achievement after completing this quest.
<color=#ffd780>Achievement Category - Nod-Krai: An Elysium of Moonlight and Wandering (I)</color>
<color=#ffffff>The Sins of the Fathers</color>
Complete the adventure at the Kuuvahki Experimental Design Bureau.
